change1: - Changed: Moved the 'Get XML from Android Device' button to avoid overlap with font selection button.
change3: - Fixed: Restored font is not showing as the default font in the GUI.
change4: - Fixed: The Ai Analysis window incorrectly hangs around from the previous analysis while doing a new analysis.
change5: - Fixed: If displaying a single task only, the total number of Profiles displayed included the total for all Profiles under the Project in which the Task is contained, rather than just 1.
change6: - Fixed: The 'Set Prompt' Ai Analysis dialog window is not always selectable.
change7: - Fixed: "Reset Settings' does not reset the font to the default monospace Courier font.
change8: - Fixed: Program error if trying to run analysis with no XML data loaded.
change9: - Fixed: 'Run Analysis' button turns pink even if there is no model selected.
change10: - Fixed: Select Project/Profile/Task names not working properly if there are none to select.
